TopicTitle: Bobcats soviet pack has the Buran shuttle!

Articles.Content:
Perhaps this should be posted in mods but I remember before the great forum purge there were a few threads about shuttles for KSP.

Last night I downloaded the Soviet pack by Bobcat and was pleased to find that it included a functioning Buran. By functioning I mean working cargo bay, manipulator, and docking system. It's awesome.

Just thought I'd pass the word if anybody didnt know already.
